name: Flowering Across 樱下花期
description:
Synopsis：


In the season when the cherry is at full blossom, an ordinary high school girl met a sakura youkai, they gradually got along with each other and the story unfolded

Game mode：


This game is a pure story based visual novel with multiple story options and a total of four endings, it would take about 20 minutes for a single ending to be reached


Controls：


↑↓←→：Selecting choices
Space：Confirm,continuing the story
ESC：Save progress

Others：


1.This game is a sequel of the game Waterside Chirping released in August 2nd 2018, and the timeline takes place several years after the previous game, the female protagonist has forgot most of the events
2.This game contains yuri and Girls’ love
